Uses of Class
domino.SingleTile

    • Uses of SingleTile in domino

      Methods in domino that return SingleTile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SingleTile Table.getRight(int row)
      This method gets the valid tile of the table, used in the Solo1 game.
      SingleTile Player.getTile(int a)
      This method gets the chosen tile.
      SingleTile Tiles.getTile(int value)
      This method gets the desired tile.
      SingleTile TilesAll7.getTile(int value)
      Gets the tile the user wants to play.
      Methods in domino that return types with arguments of type SingleTile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getB1Tiles5()
      Gets new tiles for the first bot.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getB2Tiles5()
      Gets new tiles for the second bot.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getB3Tiles5()
      Gets new tiles for the third bot.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> Tiles.getBotHand()
      This method returns the tiles that the bot holds.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getBtiles7()
      Gets new tiles for the bot.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> Tiles.getPlayerHand()
      This method returns the tiles that the players holds.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getPTiles5()
      Gets new tiles for the player if there are playing 3-4 players.
      java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> TilesAll7.getPtiles7()
      Gets new tiles for the player.
      Methods in domino with parameters of type SingleTile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Stack.addToStack(SingleTile tile)
      This method adds the given tile to the stack and checks if the tile can be put or not.
      void videoGame.addToStack(SingleTile tile)
      Adds the given tile to the stack used in the Solo1 and Hungarian mode.
      void videoGame.addToStack7(SingleTile tile)
      Adds the given tile to the stack used in All7 mode.
      void Stack.addToStackAsBot(SingleTile tile)
      This method adds the given tile to the stack without the ability of the position's choice.
      void videoGame.addToStackAsBot(SingleTile tile)
      Adds the tile to the stack when the bot plays in the Solo1 or Hungarian mode.
      void videoGame.addToStackAsBot7(SingleTile tile)
      Adds the tile to the stack when the bot plays used in the All7 mode.
      void videoGame.addToStackH(SingleTile tile)
      Adds the tile to the stack used in the Hungarian mode.
      void Player.returnTile(int a, SingleTile atile)
      This method returns a tile to the chosen position.
      void Table.returnTile(SingleTile tile, int row)
      This method returns the given tile back to the specified row of the table.
      Method parameters in domino with type arguments of type SingleTile 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Player.getHand(java.util.ArrayList<SingleTile> hand)
      This method sets the player's hand.
